mapper.select: SELECT PR.ID , PR.NAME , PR.DEL_FLG , PRA.ROLE_ID , PRA.AUTH_ID FROM PPOG_ROLES PR LEFT JOIN PPOG_ROLE_AUTH PRA ON PRA.ROLE_ID = PR.ID WHERE PR.DEL_FLG = 'approved' ORDER BY PR.ID ASC

SELECT PR.ID , PR.NAME , PR.DEL_FLG , PRA.ROLE_ID , PRA.AUTH_ID FROM PPOG_ROLES PR LEFT JOIN PPOG_ROLE_AUTH PRA ON PRA.ROLE_ID = PR.ID WHERE PR.DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} AND PR.ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

SELECT PR.ID , PR.NAME , PR.DEL_FLG , PRA.ROLE_ID , PRA.AUTH_ID FROM PPOG_ROLES PR LEFT JOIN PPOG_ROLE_AUTH PRA ON PRA.ROLE_ID = PR.ID WHERE PR.DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} AND PR.NAME LIKE #{keyword,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} OFFSET #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS ONLY
